data.name: test
data.value: test

data.name: Cafe_Intro
data.value: Welcome to the Metano Café! How can I help you today?

data.name: Cafe_Intro_Return
data.value: Will there be anything else today?

data.name: Cafe_Option_Ferment
data.value: Ferment

data.name: Cafe_Option_Special
data.value: Special

data.name: Cafe_Setting_Up
data.value: We're still setting up,[pause=10] come back when I've come up with some drinks to sell!

data.name: Cafe_Bought_Special
data.value: Sorry you two,[pause=10] I can only sell one special a day.[pause=0] Come back tomorrow!

data.name: Cafe_Daily_Special
data.value: Today's special is {0} and it'll cost ya [color=#00FFFF]{1}[color] \uE024,[pause=10] is that ok?

data.name: Cafe_No_Money
data.value: Looks like you haven't got enough money.

data.name: Cafe_Bag_Full
data.value: Looks like your bag is full.[pause=0] Go visit {0} and then visit again!

data.name: Cafe_Special_Complete
data.value: Here's your {0}![pause=0] Enjoy!

data.name: Cafe_Info_1
data.value: Welcome to my café![pause=0] I can ferment tasty and useful drinks for you!

data.name: Cafe_Info_2
data.value: Give me the required ingredients,[pause=10] and I'll ferment the drink for you overnight.

data.name: Cafe_Info_3
data.value: Just make sure you haven't equipped any items you want to give me!

data.name: Cafe_Info_4
data.value: You can check the drinks' recipes and their effects on that sign there.

data.name: Cafe_Info_5
data.value: I also sell a daily special on the side.[pause=0] The special can be quite a treat sometimes!

data.name: Cafe_Goodbye
data.value: Don't be a stranger![pause=0] Come back soon!

data.name: Cafe_Fermented_Give_Item_1
data.value: Hey,[pause=10] welcome back![pause=0] I finished fermenting that {0} for you!

data.name: Cafe_Fermented_Item_Received
data.value: You received the {0} from {1}![pause=40]

data.name: Cafe_Expedition_Item_Intro_1
data.value: You two are leaving on that expedition tomorrow right?

data.name: Cafe_Expedition_Item_Intro_2
data.value: Have a little something on the house.[pause=0] I hope it keeps you in high spirits on your journey!

data.name: Cafe_Expedition_Prevent_Fermenting_1
data.value: You two have that expedition tomorrow.[pause=0] It'll take too long for me to ferment anything before you leave.

data.name: Cafe_Expedition_Prevent_Fermenting_2
data.value: Come see me after your journey,[pause=10] and I'll gladly ferment something for you!

data.name: Cafe_Option_Domi
data.value: Domi Blend

data.name: Cafe_Option_Cider
data.value: Apple Cider

data.name: Cafe_Ferment_Prompt
data.value: What drink would you like me to ferment for you?

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Intro
data.value: {0}'s drink recipes and effects are listed on the sign.

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Which_Drinks
data.value: Which would you like to know more about?

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Domi_1
data.value: Fully restores the party's HP. Lowers the party's Atk / Sp. Atk but raises Def and Sp. Def in return.

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Domi_2
data.value: Requires 3 {0} and {1}.

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Cider_1
data.value: Initially comes with 4 servings. Restores HP by half and fills belly somewhat.

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Cider_2
data.value: Requires 3 {0} and 1 {1}.

data.name: Cafe_Option_Bomb
data.value: Cheri Bomb

data.name: Cafe_Begin_Fermenting_3
data.value: OK![pause=0] I've started fermenting that {0} for you![pause=0] Come see me tomorrow when it's ready!

data.name: Cafe_Missing_Ingredients
data.value: It seems as though you don't have all the ingredients needed for that {0}!

data.name: Cafe_Already_Fermenting
data.value: I'm already fermenting that {0} for you![pause=0] Come back tomorrow when it's ready!

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Bomb_1
data.value: A brew that is dangerously explosive! Throw it to cause an explosion where it lands.

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Bomb_2
data.value: Requires 1 {0} and 1 {1}.

data.name: Cafe_Info_6
data.value: I change my special everyday,[pause=10] so be sure to stop in often!

data.name: Cafe_Begin_Fermenting_1
data.value: Got it![pause=0] Let me just get everything where it needs to be...

data.name: Cafe_Begin_Fermenting_2
data.value: Haah!

data.name: Cafe_Confirm_Ferment_Choice
data.value: You want me to brew a {0} for you then?

data.name: Cafe_Fermented_Give_Item_2
data.value: And here it is![pause=0] One {0},[pause=10] freshly fermented!

data.name: Cafe_Option_Endurance
data.value: Endurance Tonic

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Endurance_1
data.value: A bitter tonic that prevents the user from fainting for a few turns, even if they move.

data.name: Cafe_Sign_Endurance_2
data.value: Requires 1 {0} and 1 {1}.

data.name: Cafe_New_Drink_1
data.value: Oh,[pause=10] it's you two![pause=0] Just a heads up,[pause=10] there's a new drink on the menu!

data.name: Cafe_New_Drink_2
data.value: You can check the ingredients you need for it on the sign over there![pause=0] Be sure to try it sometime!
